name: Sarah
aboutMe: Full stack Engineer with a passion for front end development, UI/UX design, and accessibility| Equity & Inclusion Expert | Latina in tech

experiences.title: Site Reliability Engineering Fellow
experiences.descriptions: I Learned Site Reliability Engineering skills including Linux Fundamentals, Scripting, Databasing, Testing, Containers, CICD, Monitoring and Networking, and Troubleshooting. I Built Portfolio Project and launched it via Digital Ocean and DuckDNS.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.descriptions: I Updated all license types throughout the website to be current with the CC 4.0 Licensing types. I Created a new feature allowing users to see the license history for all 112 million+ photos on Flickr.I Researched and applied a CoC for Flickrâ€™s open source repositories. I Wrote a post for the Flickr Blog on the new open source CoC. I Coordinated with both front and backend teams in order to ship the best possible product for the Flickr Commons.

experiences.title: Software Engineer in Training
experiences.descriptions: I Learned new technologies under a deadline and developed 5 full-stack applications in various languages. I Set up multiple backend services using SQL, PostGres, and Docker using synthetic data for users to access in order to utilize frontend services. I Deployed multiple front-end applications using React+Express+Bootstrap and Vanilla JS+HTML+CSS utilizing API calls. I Led morning stand up meetings and closing wrap up meetings of 13+ engineers and facilitated daily agenda items throughout the workday. I Assisted teammates with debugging code & implementing new features.
